name: "I Am Peter, Hear Me Roar" Online Trivia | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is not a guarantee when you buy the Timeshare house that Peter and Lois were pressured to buy?
questions.explanation:
No old people.

	The presentation was mainly a slide show of people being eaten by ogres in front of their Timeshare houses.  Peter and Lois only went to the presentation to get a free boat.

questions.text: Who on Spooner Street does not get a boat?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	Peter decides to choose "the mystery box" and throw away the chance at getting a boat.  The mystery box contained tickets to a comedy club.

questions.text: What is the name of Peter's great-grandfather?
questions.explanation:
Huck griffin & Huck.

	Huck rafted down the muddy Mississippi.  Peter mentions this when he tells Brian that boating is in his blood.

questions.text: Peter has to go to a workplace sensitivity training course at the Quahog Community Center.  Who is his teacher?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Ironbox

	Mrs. Ironbox is also an attorney of a woman at Peter's job.  Peter gets the toy company sued for sexual harassment because Peter told a dirty joke.  Mrs. Ironbox is voiced by Candice Bergen from Murphy Brown.

questions.text: Where does Peter go for a course on sensitivity and changing his attitude toward women?
questions.explanation:
A women's retreat.

	Peter goes on the womens retreat forced by Mrs. Ironbox.  When he returns, he's very feminine and treats women better than men.

questions.text: How many weeks is Peter at his training course?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	Peter has a better attitude toward women after his bottom lip is stretched over the back of his head and down to his neck.  The women said that it was the same feeling as childbirth.

questions.text: When Peter says he has a breast lump, what is actually the lump?
questions.explanation:
A Cheeto.

	Peter states that he needs a breast exam when Lois says Peter is forgetting about her feminine side.  Peter never realizes until the end of the episode.

questions.text: Who does Lois go to for help when Peter doesn't show signs of masculinity?
questions.explanation:
Quagmire.

	Lois asks Quagmire to change him back, but Quagmire actually thought for a moment that Lois was hitting on him.

questions.text: What brings Peter back to his senses?
questions.explanation:
A catfight.

	Peter watches Lois and Mrs. Ironbox fight at a womens charity dinner and he turns back to the normal pig he once was.

questions.text: Chris does not speak during this episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Chris only has two or three minor lines during th whole episode.  Through later episodes, he will have larger parts and more roles.
